title: Ayurveda Yoga Meditation
description: An application dedicated to Ayurveda, the science of life, which also deals with the disciplines of Yoga and Meditation; these 3 disciplines being closely linked, even inseparable in the Samkhya philosophy. "Ayurveda Yoga Meditation" will enable you to understand these disciplines, their philosophy...
cleaned_text: Ayurveda Yoga Meditation 17+ Ayurveda Yoga Meditation [ thibaud cainne ](https://apps.apple.com/us/developer/thibaud-cainne/id1174449468) Designed for iPad - - Free Screenshots Description Application ayurveda, yoga and medidation. An application dedicated to Ayurveda, the science of life, which also deals with the disciplines of Yoga and Meditation; these 3 disciplines being closely linked, even inseparable in the Samkhya philosophy. "Ayurveda Yoga Meditation" will enable you to understand these disciplines, their philosophy, and to lead you towards "the knowledge of the Self". A holistic approach of Ayurveda to achieve balance, harmony and better health. You will be able to evaluate your dosha constitution, and to know all the recommendations for each constitutional type: food, daily routine, lifestyle, massages, exercises... Dosha Vata, Pitta, Kapha will no longer have any secrets for you! A glossary to understand the main ayurvedic terms: nadis, dosha: Pitta, Kapha or Vitta. If you are looking for an application on Ayurveda, you will find your happiness here! What's New Version 2.1.005 New SDK Ratings and Reviews App Privacy The developer, thibaud cainne, indicated that the app's privacy practices may include handling of data as described below. For more information, see the [developer's privacy policy](https://www.ayur-vedas.com/welcome/privacy/fr/). Data Not Linked to You The following data may be collected but it is not linked to your identity: - Contact Info - Identifiers Privacy practices may vary, for example, based on the features you use or your age. [Learn More](https://apps.apple.com/story/id1538632801) Information - Seller - thibaud cainne - Size - 72.8 MB - Category - [Health & Fitness](https://itunes.apple.com/us/genre/id6013) - Compatibility - - iPhone - Requires iOS 12.0 or later. - iPad - Requires iPadOS 12.0 or later. - iPod touch - Requires iOS 12.0 or later. - Mac - Requires macOS 11.0 or later and a Mac with Apple M1 chip or later. - Languages - English - Age Rating - 17+ Infrequent/Mild Medical/Treatment Information Unrestricted Web Access - Copyright - © All copyright - Price - Free
